visual.name: pafnow-process-mining
visual.description: Visualize various processes based on event logs

de-DE.EventLabelDescriptionKey: Wird als Label für Knoten im Graphen verwendet
de-DE.OrderByDescriptionKey: Ereignisse innerhalb von Vorgängen werden nach diesem Feld sortiert
de-DE.TimestampDescriptionKey: Datum und Uhrzeit an dem ein Ereignis stattgefunden hat
de-DE.TimestampEndDescriptionKey: Datum und Uhrzeit an dem ein Ereignis beendet wurde.
de-DE.NodesDescriptionKey: Einstellungen um das Aussehen von Knoten im Graphen zu kontrollieren (Vollversion holen für vollständige Kontrolle)
de-DE.EdgesDescriptionKey: Einstellungen um das Aussehen von Kanten im Graphen zu kontrollieren (Vollversion holen für vollständige Kontrolle)
de-DE.MinThicknessDescriptionKey: Minimum für Kanten-Stärke, Kanten werden nicht kleiner angezeigt
de-DE.MaxThicknessDescriptionKey: Maximum für Kanten-Stärke, Kanten werden nicht größer angezeigt
de-DE.HighlightColorDescriptionKey: Farbe um Kanten auf Basis der Durchlaufzeiten hervorzuheben
de-DE.HideDurationZeroDescriptionKey: Blendet Nullwerte in der Anzeige von Durchlaufzeiten aus
de-DE.DurationUnitsDescriptionKey: Die Anzahl der Einheiten die angezeigt werden soll
de-DE.LeastSignificantDurationDescriptionKey: Durchlaufzeiten werden in der niedrigstwertigen Einheit angezeigt
de-DE.AutoModeDescriptionKey: Automatische Berechnung des Referenzmodells, falls keines eingestellt ist
de-DE.IsNotConformDescriptionKey: Farbe auswählen für ist nicht konform
de-DE.LegendDescriptionKey: Die Legende dient zur Gruppierung des Prozessablaufs
de-DE.GroupByDescriptionKey: Group your processes according to predefined groups
de-DE.HappyPathDescriptionKey: Wenn der HappyPath Happy ist, sehen Sie alle Varianten, die mit der häufigsten Startaktivität (Happy Start) beginnen und mit der häufigsten Endaktivität (Happy End) enden. Alle anderen Varianten sind Not Happy.
de-DE.YearDescriptionKey: Gruppierung nach spezifischem Anfangsjahr der Fälle
de-DE.MonthDescriptionKey: Gruppierung nach spezifischem Anfangsmonat der Fälle
de-DE.PositionDescriptionKey: Wählen Sie den Ort für die Legende aus
de-DE.TitleDescriptionKey: Zeige einen Titel für die Legendensymbole an
de-DE.LayoutDescriptionKey: Einstellungen um das Layout des Graphen zu kontrollieren
de-DE.MultiGraphLayoutDescriptionKey: Wähle ein Layout des Diagramms aus, wenn die Legende gesetzt ist
de-DE.AlignmentDescriptionKey: Bestimmt die Ausrichtung von Knoten im Graphen
de-DE.RankSepDescriptionKey: Ändert den Abstand zwischen Knoten in Layoutrichtung
de-DE.NodeSepDescriptionKey: Ändert den Abstand zwischen Knoten senkrecht zur Layoutrichtung
de-DE.PremiumFeaturesDescriptionKey: Diese Features sind nur mit PAFnow Premium verfügbar
de-DE.VariantIndicatorDescriptionKey: Hervorheben von Kanten und Knoten, die eine Variante mit der ausgewählten Kante oder dem ausgewählten Knoten teilen
de-DE.FilterPreviewDescriptionKey: Hervorheben von Kanten und Knoten, die eine Variante mit dem vorgesehenen Filter teilen
de-DE.MinimapDescriptionKey: Aktiviert eine Minimap zur mühelosen Navigation
de-DE.Role_MaximumReached: ⓘ Sie haben die maximale Anzahl von Datenpunkten erreicht. Sie sollten ein Upgrade in Betracht ziehen.

en-US.EventLabelDescriptionKey: Is used as the label for nodes in the graph
en-US.OrderByDescriptionKey: Events within a case will be sorted by this field
en-US.TimestampDescriptionKey: The time on which the event was executed
en-US.TimestampEndDescriptionKey: The time at which an event ended
en-US.NodesDescriptionKey: Settings to control the appearance of nodes in the graph (Get full version for complete control)
en-US.EdgesDescriptionKey: Settings to control the appearance of edges in the graph (Get full version for complete control)
en-US.MinThicknessDescriptionKey: Edge thickness minimum, edges will not be smaller than this
en-US.MaxThicknessDescriptionKey: Edge thickness maximum, edges will not be bigger than this
en-US.HighlightColorDescriptionKey: Color to highlight edges based on duration
en-US.DurationUnitsDescriptionKey: Select how many units to show
en-US.LeastSignificantDurationDescriptionKey: Shows durations only using least significant unit
en-US.ConformanceDescriptionKey: Determine settings for the conformity function
en-US.AutoModeDescriptionKey: Automatic calculation of the reference model if none is set
en-US.IsNotConformDescriptionKey: Select color for is not conform
en-US.HasBeenSkippedDescriptionKey: Select color for has been skipped
en-US.LegendDescriptionKey: Legend is used to group the process flow
en-US.GroupByDescriptionKey: Group your processes according to predefined groups
en-US.HappyPathDescriptionKey: If the HappyPath is Happy, you will see all variants that start with the most frequent start activity (Happy Start) and end with the most frequent end activity (Happy End). All other variants are Not Happy.
en-US.YearDescriptionKey: Grouping by specific starting year of cases
en-US.MonthDescriptionKey: Grouping by specific starting month of cases
en-US.PositionDescriptionKey: Select the location for the legend
en-US.TitleDescriptionKey: Display a title for legend symbols
en-US.LayoutDescriptionKey: Settings to control the layout of the graph
en-US.DirectionDescriptionKey: Sets the layout direction of the graph
en-US.AlignmentDescriptionKey: Sets the alignment of the nodes in the graph
en-US.RankSepDescriptionKey: Changes distance between nodes in layout direction
en-US.NodeSepDescriptionKey: Changes distance between nodes perpendicular to layout direction
en-US.PremiumFeaturesDescriptionKey: These features are available in the premium version of PAFnow
en-US.VariantIndicatorDescriptionKey: Highlight edges and nodes that share a variant with the selected edge or node
en-US.FilterPreviewDescriptionKey: Highlight edges and nodes that share a variant with the intended filter
en-US.MinimapDescriptionKey: Activate a minimap to navigate effortlessly
en-US.Role_MaximumReached: ⓘ You have reached the maximum number of values. Consider upgrading.

dataRoles.description: The activity name of the event
dataRoles.name: activityName

dataRoles.description: Events within a case will be sorted by this field
dataRoles.name: orderBy

dataRoles.description: This field is used to calculate durations between events
dataRoles.name: timestamp

dataRoles.description: This field is used to calculate duration of events and the duration between events
dataRoles.name: timestampEnd

dataRoles.description: This field is used to split the graph into different categories
dataRoles.name: legend

primaryColor.description: The primary color used for theming

secondaryColor.description: The secondary color used for theming

nodes.description: Settings to control the appearance of nodes in the graph

invertSizeScale.description: Invert the node size scale when node size is set

nodeBorderWidth.description: Node border width (relative to font size)

AvgDuration.description: Add avg. duration to node tooltips

SumDuration.description: Add sum of duration to node tooltips

MedianDuration.description: Add median of duration to node tooltips

edges.description: Settings to control the appearance of edges in the graph

invertThicknessScale.description: Invert the edge thickness scale when edge thickness is set

minThickness.description: Edge thickness minimum, edges will not be smaller than this

maxThickness.description: Edge thickness maximum, edges will not be bigger than this

edgeLabelRelative.description: Scale edge labels according to edge thickness

mostSignificantUnit.description: Durations will be shown with the most significan unit

edgeDurationNumberOfUnits.description: Select how many units to show

showDecimalDuration.description: Shows durations only using least significant unit

AvgDuration.description: Add avg. duration to edge labels

SumDuration.description: Add sum of duration to edge labels

MedianDuration.description: Add median of duration to node labels

AvgDuration.description: Add avg. duration to edge tooltips

SumDuration.description: Add sum of duration to edge tooltips

MedianDuration.description: Add median of duration to node tooltips

conformance.description: Determine settings for the conformity function

notConformColor.description: Select color for is not conform

modelColor.description: Select color for has been skipped

showModelMoves.description: Display model moves for the closest variant

position.description: Select the location for the legend

showTitle.description: Display a title for legend symbols

layout.description: Settings to control the layout of the graph

multiGraphLayout.description: How to layout the graph when legend is set

rankDir.description: Sets the layout direction of the graph

align.description: Sets the alignment of the nodes in the graph

rankSep.description: Changes distance between nodes in layout direction

nodeSep.description: Changes distance between nodes perpendicular to layout direction

advanced.description: These features are available in the premium version of PAFnow

variantIndicator.description: Highlight edges and nodes that share a variant with the hovered edge or node

variantIndicatorMode.description: Controls what the variant indicator will highlight

filterPreview.description: Highlight edges and nodes that share a variant with the intended filter

minimap.description: Activate a minimap to navigate effortlessly

deviationHighlight.description: Compares the selected with the not selected data

size.description: Size of the cache in MB

occupied.description: Shows the size of the current cache

duration.description: Duration of the animation in milliseconds

customizableLinks.description: Enable the tools to customize links
